Description: I have a peavey pxd tomb 2 guitar with coffin hard case. It plays very well and is in excellent shape overall. Emg pickups and a neck with great access which makes it easy to play up and down the whole neck. It will be packed well and insured . Thanks for looking!SPECS The Peavey PXD Tomb II Guitar is the sound of full-on aggression with supercharged active pickups anchored to menacing slabs of tone-sustaining mahogany. The Tomb II electric guitar is the perfect complement to Peavey 6505 Series guitar amplifiers, already a metal legend in the arsenals of bands like Trivium, In Flames, Bullet For My Valentine, Machine Head, Darkest Hour and more. True to the music that inspired them, Peavey PXD Series electric guitars are built for speed, slicing leads and razor-sharp riffs.The PXD Tomb II features high output EMG active pickups and the EMG-AB Afterburner tone circuit, which boosts input gain up to 20 dB--for the highest levels of saturation anywhere.Features Mahogany bodySet mahogany neck with rosewood fretboard with aluminum inlay24 frets24-3/4" scalePrecision tuners2 EMG pickups2 volume controls1 Afterburner control3-way toggle switchString-thru-body bridgeBlack hardware
Title: Peavey electric guitar with coffin case
ConditionDescription: I have a awesome peavey PXD Tomb 2 guitar with coffin case. This guitar plays excellent and has easy access to the whole neck. EMG pickups.
